title: (x) Pillango sturdy serif face - ITC Cushing {Norbert}
content:
Help me. My mojo is low.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/unknown_3560.jpg)
author: Stephen Coles

comments.content:
Geez… I hope you get yo’ mojo running.

Howzabout [ITC Cushing Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20070403071639/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-cushing/bold/)

 ![](files/Cushing%20Bold_5146.png)
Dude’s been slaving away like a loonatic, getting Interrobang to the printer’s. I hesitated on starting Stewf Aid!
Thanks pals. I’ll be better in a week or so.
